title: RP transfer
body: hi, i was just wondering if there is any possibility that you can move rp from 1 of my accounts to my main. i had to buy rp on a different account because my account won't let me buy rp and i need to be level 10 to send rp skins or champs and it's annoying that the rp is now going to waste...

replies.body: RP transfer is not currently a feature in the client, so I'm not sure if we can help with this one.  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case though, to see if our Billing team can find some options for you!
